changes.reasoning: Migrate CLI TUI from custom rendering to OpenTUI components. This replaces the custom ANSI rendering with OpenTUI's BoxRenderable, TextRenderable, ScrollBoxRenderable, and DiffRenderable components for a better terminal UI experience with proper word-wrapping and built-in diff viewing.
Switch from Node.js/tsc to Bun for building and runtime. OpenTUI uses Bun's FFI and requires the Bun runtime. Updated build scripts, shebang, and package configuration for ESM module support.
Convert imports to ESM format with .js extensions as required by NodeNext module resolution. This is needed for proper ESM compatibility with Bun.
Add tree-sitter wasm and scm assets to gitignore. These are bundled by Bun during build and shouldn't be committed to version control.
